detailed_translations.english: a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family

name: maze
trans: n. 迷宫；迷惑；糊涂 vt. 迷失；使混乱；使困惑 n. (Maze)人名；(英)梅兹；(法)马兹

sentences.english: We got completely lost in the maze.
sentences.chinese: 我们在迷宫中彻底迷了路。

sentences.english: the famous Hampton Court maze
sentences.chinese: 著名的汉普顿宫迷宫

detailed_translations.english: a specially designed system of paths, often in a park or public garden, which is difficult to find your way through

name: plane
trans: n. 飞机；平面；程度，水平 vi. 刨；乘飞机旅行；翱翔 vt. 刨平；用刨子刨；掠过水面 adj. 平的；平面的 n. (Plane)人名；(塞、瑞典、法)普拉内

sentences.english: It is a big airline with a large fleet of planes.
sentences.chinese: 这是一家大航空公司，拥有庞大的机群。

sentences.english: It’s much quicker to go by plane.
sentences.chinese: 乘飞机去会快很多。

sentences.english: She slept on the plane.
sentences.chinese: 她在飞机上睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies in the air and has wings and at least one engine

name: car
trans: n. 汽车；车厢 n. (Car)人名；(土)贾尔；(法、西)卡尔；(塞)察尔

sentences.english: Dan got out of the car and locked the door.
sentences.chinese: 丹下了车，锁上车门。

sentences.english: He isn’t old enough to drive a car.
sentences.chinese: 他还未到可以开车的年龄。

sentences.english: Coughlan was killed in a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 科赫兰死于一场车祸。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers

name: door
trans: n. 门；家，户；门口；通道 n. (Door)人名；(英)多尔

sentences.english: Could you open the door for me?
sentences.chinese: 请你帮我开门好吗？

sentences.english: The door flew open and Ruth stormed in.
sentences.chinese: 门一下子打开了，露丝气冲冲地跑了进来。

sentences.english: Don’t forget to lock the garage door.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了把车库的门锁上。

sentences.english: Marc appeared through a door at the far end of the room.
sentences.chinese: 马克从房间另一端的门口出现。

sentences.english: the family that lives three doors up from us
sentences.chinese: 住在与我们相隔三户的那户人家

detailed_translations.english: a piece of wood, glass, etc. that is opened and closed so that people can get in and out of a room, building, car, etc.; a similar thing in a cupboard/closet

name: engine
trans: n. 引擎，发动机；机车，火车头；工具

sentences.english: Is the engine running smoothly?
sentences.chinese: 发动机运转平稳吗？

sentences.english: We were stranded with engine trouble on a deserted highway.
sentences.chinese: 我们因发动机故障而被困在空无一人的公路上。

sentences.english: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 1941年，火车可能已由蒸汽机车来牵引了。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a vehicle that produces power to make it move

name: light
trans: n. 光；光线；灯；打火机；领悟；浅色；天窗 adj. 轻的；浅色的；明亮的；轻松的；容易的；清淡的 vi. 点着；变亮；着火 vt. 照亮；点燃；着火 adv. 轻地；清楚地；轻便地 n. (Light)（英）莱特（人名）

sentences.english: You can carry this bag – it’s fairly light.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.english: You should wear light, comfortable shoes.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

sentences.english: The truck was quite light and easy to drive.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.english: people who have suffered only light exposure to radiation
sentences.chinese: 只受到轻度辐射的人

detailed_translations.english: not very heavy

name: seat
trans: n. 座位；所在地；职位 vt. 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

name: trunk
trans: n. 树干；躯干；象鼻；汽车车尾的行李箱 vt. 把…放入旅行箱内 adj. 干线的；躯干的；箱子的 n. (Trunk)人名；(德、匈、西)特伦克

sentences.english: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk .
sentences.chinese: 他把他的自行车斜靠在树干上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 树干；躯干；象鼻；汽车车尾的行李箱
detailed_translations.english: the thick central woody stem of a tree

name: wheel
trans: n. 车轮；方向盘；转动 vt. 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子 vi. 旋转；突然转变方向；盘旋飞行

sentences.english: Shall I take the wheel (= drive instead of someone else )?
sentences.chinese: 我来开车好吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子
detailed_translations.english: to push something that has wheels somewhere

name: window
trans: n. 窗；窗口；窗户

sentences.english: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.english: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.chinese: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.english: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

name: kitten
trans: n. 小猫；小动物 vi. 产小猫 n. (Kitten)人名；(法)基滕

sentences.english: She nursed her kitten all evening.
sentences.chinese: 整个晚上她一直抱着她的小猫咪。

sentences.english: Don't starve the kitten.
sentences.chinese: 别饿着小猫。

sentences.english: Let someone else waste their own time filtering out the kitten stories.
sentences.chinese: 让别的某某人去浪费时间筛选这些小猫的故事吧。

detailed_translations.english: a young cat

name: many
trans: det. 许多 pron. 许多；许多人 adj. 许多的 n. 大多数人 n. (Many) （美、法、加、印）马尼（人名）

sentences.english: Among his many hobbies was the breeding of fine horses.
sentences.chinese: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

sentences.english: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.chinese: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.english: Not many expected Ferdinand to be such a success this season.
sentences.chinese: 预料到费迪南德在本赛季如此成功的人并不多。

detailed_translations.english: a large number of people or things
many people

name: backpack
trans: n. 双肩背包，背包；远足用的背包 vt. 挑运；把…放入背包 vi. 背负简便行李旅行；挑运

detailed_translations.english: a  rucksack

name: crayon
trans: n. 蜡笔，有色粉笔 vt. 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画 n. (Crayon)人名；(英)克雷恩

sentences.english: He coloured the picture with crayon.
sentences.chinese: 他用蜡笔给画上色。

sentences.english: They send letters — one time in crayon — detailing their rights and how I am violating some maritime treaty from the 1700s.
sentences.chinese: 他们寄信，有一次甚至是蜡笔写的，详细的描述了他们的权利和我如何违反了某些1700年代的海上条约。

detailed_translations.english: a stick of coloured  wax  or  chalk  that children use to draw pictures

detailed_translations.chinese: 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画
detailed_translations.english: to draw something with a crayon

name: eraser
trans: n. 橡皮；擦除器；[计] 清除器

sentences.english: Yes, I have your eraser, too.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我还拿了你的橡皮。

sentences.english: That is an eraser.
sentences.chinese: 那是一块橡皮擦。

sentences.english: I have an eraser.
sentences.chinese: 我有一块橡皮。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of rubber that you use to remove pencil or pen marks from paper

name: pencil
trans: n. 铅笔；笔状物 vt. 用铅笔写；用眉笔涂 vi. 成铅笔状

sentences.english: a sharp pencil
sentences.chinese: 尖尖的铅笔

sentences.english: a blue pencil
sentences.chinese: 蓝色铅笔

sentences.english: a pencil sketch
sentences.chinese: 铅笔速写

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that you use for writing or drawing, consisting of a wooden stick with a thin piece of a black or coloured substance in the middle
to write something or make a mark with a pencil

name: ruler
trans: n. 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人

sentences.english: a 12-inch ruler
sentences.chinese: 一把12英寸的尺子

detailed_translations.chinese: 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人
detailed_translations.english: someone such as a king or queen who has official power over a country or area

name: sweater
trans: n. 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂

sentences.english: Somebody pinched my sweater.
sentences.chinese: 有人偷了我的运动衫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂
detailed_translations.english: a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body

name: bell
trans: n. 铃，钟；钟声，铃声；钟状物 vt. 装钟于，系铃于 vi. 鸣钟；成钟状鼓起

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that makes a ringing sound, used as a signal or to get someone’s attention

name: candle
trans: n. 蜡烛；烛光；烛形物 vt. 对着光检查

sentences.english: The candle flickered in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.english: The candle flickered and then went out.
sentences.chinese: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.english: When the candle was only half an inch high it flickered out and the room became dark.
sentences.chinese: 蜡烛只有半英寸长时，烛光忽闪忽闪地熄灭了，于是房间一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: a stick of  wax  with a string through the middle, which you burn to give light

name: cookie
trans: n. 饼干；小甜点

sentences.english: a glass of milk and a cookie
sentences.chinese: 一杯牛奶和一块小甜饼

sentences.english: a chocolate chip cookie
sentences.chinese: 带巧克力碎粒的小甜饼

detailed_translations.english: a small flat sweet cake

name: flower
trans: n. 花；精华；开花植物 vi. 成熟，发育；开花；繁荣；旺盛 vt. 使开花；用花装饰 n. (Flower)人名；(英)弗劳尔

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

name: make
trans: vt. 使得；进行；布置，准备，整理；制造；认为；获得；形成；安排；引起；构成 vi. 开始；前进；增大；被制造 n. 制造；构造；性情 n. (Make)人名；(塞、南非)马克

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

name: Santa
trans: n. 圣诞老人（等于Santa Claus）

sentences.english: From then on，red stockings were hung by the chimney in hopes Santa would fill them with gifts.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，红色长筒袜就常被挂在烟囱上，希望圣诞老人能够在里面塞满礼物。

sentences.english: Once they settled in, my father looked back over his shoulder and asked the children if Santa had found them yet.
sentences.chinese: 一旦他们在汽车里安顿了下来，爸爸转过头来问那几个孩子，圣诞老人是否找到了他们。

sentences.english: Try something new whether it’s a gift or an experience so you can keep the years from becoming a blur. This will always be the year that I first dressed up like Santa.
sentences.chinese: 不管是一件礼物还是一次体验，尝试新的东西可以让那些美好的日子不至于那么快消散，我第一次当圣诞老人的这一年亦将成为记忆中的永恒。

name: snowflake
trans: n. 雪花；雪片莲；独特、特别的人（非正式）；过分敏感的人（非正式）

sentences.english: The gift, the snowflake, the starry sky, the moonlight all give you.
sentences.chinese: 礼物，雪花，满天星斗的天空，在月光下的所有给你。

sentences.english: Bell is my greetings, singing is my blessing, snowflake is my card, wine is my kiss, the breeze is I embrace, happiness is my gift!
sentences.chinese: 钟声是我的问候，歌声是我的祝福，雪花是我的贺卡，美酒是我的飞吻，清风是我的拥抱，快乐是我的礼物！

sentences.english: Moonlight Christmas and snowflake bless my speech as you, I give you with blessings, are you happy?
sentences.chinese: 圣诞的月光和雪花都不如你祝福我的话语，我把同的祝福给你，你快乐吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small soft flat piece of frozen water that falls as snow

name: snowman
trans: n. 雪人 n. (Snowman)人名；(英)斯诺曼

sentences.english: The children were balling up snow to make a snowman.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们正在把雪堆成球状，做一个雪人。

sentences.english: "He gave me a hug and a kiss and asked me where my snowman was," she said.
sentences.chinese: 黛比说：“他给了我一个拥抱和亲吻。 还问我的雪人在哪里。”

sentences.english: If you are wrong,the snowman with the correct answer will chill your heart.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是错误的，有正确答案的雪人将会使你的心脏变冷。

detailed_translations.english: a simple figure of a person made of snow, made especially by children

name: tree
trans: n. 树；木料；树状物 vt. 把...赶上树 vi. 爬上树；逃上树 n. (Tree)人名；(英)特里

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

name: food
trans: n. 食物；养料

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.english: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.english: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

name: hand
trans: n. 手，手艺；帮助；指针；插手 vt. 传递，交给；支持；搀扶 n. (Hand)人名；(英、瑞典)汉德

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

name: not
trans: adv. 表示否定，不 n. “非”（计算机中逻辑运算的一种）

sentences.english: Most of the stores do not open until 10 am.
sentences.chinese: 大多数商店要到上午10点才开始营业。

sentences.english: She’s not a very nice person.
sentences.chinese: 她为人不太好。

sentences.english: You were wrong not to inform the police.
sentences.chinese: 你没有通知警方是错误的。

sentences.english: ‘Can we go to the park?’ ‘No, not today, dear.’
sentences.chinese: “我们能去公园吗？”“不，今天不行，亲爱的。”

detailed_translations.english: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

name: room
trans: n. 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人 vt. 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿 vi. 居住；住宿 n. （英）鲁姆（人名）；（俄）罗姆（人名）

sentences.english: I looked around the room.
sentences.chinese: 我四下看了看房间。

sentences.english: She nodded toward a man who was standing across the room (= on the other side of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 她朝站在屋子另一头的一个男人点点头。

sentences.english: Someone was laughing in the next room (= the one beside the one you are in ) .
sentences.chinese: 隔壁房间有人在笑。

sentences.english: Here’s your key - room 348.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的钥匙——348号房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人
detailed_translations.english: a part of the inside of a building that has its own walls, floor, and ceiling

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿
detailed_translations.english: to rent and live in a room somewhere

name: shoe
trans: n. 鞋；蹄铁；外胎 vt. 给……穿上鞋；穿……鞋 n. (Shoe)人名；(英)休

sentences.english: I sat down and took off my shoes and socks.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来脱掉鞋子和袜子。

sentences.english: What size shoes do you take?
sentences.chinese: 你穿几号的鞋子？

detailed_translations.english: something that you wear to cover your feet, made of leather or some other strong material

name: bake
trans: vt. 烤，烘焙 vi. 烘面包；被烤干；受热 n. 烤；烘烤食品 n. (Bake)人名；(德、瑞典)巴克

sentences.english: I’m baking some bread.
sentences.chinese: 我在烤一些面包。

sentences.english: baked potatoes
sentences.chinese: 烤马铃薯

sentences.english: Bake at 250 degrees for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用250度的温度烤20分钟。

sentences.english: The bricks were baked in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 砖块放在太阳光下晒硬。

detailed_translations.english: to cook something using dry heat, in an oven

name: bike
trans: n. 自行车；脚踏车 vi. 骑自行车（或摩托车） n. (Bike)人名；(土、土库、塞)比克

sentences.english: Let’s go for a bike ride.

to use a needle and thread to make or repair clothes or to fasten something such as a button to them

sentences.chinese: 同样的，按这些研究者的逻辑，男性蜘蛛恐惧者每次看到蜘蛛爬过桌子都应该下身瘙痒咯？

sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

to deceive someone in order to get something from them or to make them do something

name: circle
trans: n. 循环，周期；圆；圈子；圆形物 vi. 盘旋，旋转；环行 vt. 画圆圈；环绕…移动

sentences.chinese: 画一个直径10厘米的圆形。

sentences.chinese: 约翰逊是总统核心集团的人。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, fashion comes full circle.
sentences.chinese: 时尚迟早会流行回来的。

sentences.english: This is the road that circles the city.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那条环城路。

detailed_translations.english: a completely round shape, like the letter O
to move in the shape of a circle around something, especially in the air

trans: n. 心脏；感情；勇气；心形；要点 vt. 鼓励；铭记 vi. 结心 n. (Heart)人名；(英)哈特

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

name: oval
trans: adj. 椭圆的；卵形的 n. 椭圆形；卵形 n. (Oval)人名；(法)奥瓦尔

sentences.english: ...the small oval framed picture of a little boy.
sentences.chinese: …一个小男孩的镶在椭圆形框架里的小幅照片。

detailed_translations.english: Oval things have a shape that is like a circle but is wider in one direction than the other
a shape like a circle, but wider in one direction than the other

name: shape
trans: n. 形状；模型；身材；具体化 vt. 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合 vi. 形成；成形；成长 n. (Shape)人名；(瑞典)沙佩

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

name: spiral
trans: n. 螺旋；旋涡；螺旋形之物 adj. 螺旋形的；盘旋的 vt. 使成螺旋形；使作螺旋形上升 vi. 盘旋；成螺旋形；螺旋形上升（过去式spiraled/spiralled，过去分词spiraled/spiralled，现在分词spiraling/spiralling，第三人称单数spirals，副词spirally）

sentences.english: ...a spiral staircase.
sentences.chinese: …一段旋梯。

sentences.english: The maze is actually two interlocking spirals.
sentences.chinese: 这个迷宫实际上是两个连锁的螺旋体。

sentences.english: The damaged plane spiralled to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 受损的飞机盘旋坠地

detailed_translations.english: moving in a continuous curve that winds around a central point
a line in the form of a curve that winds around a central point, moving further away from the centre all the time
to move in a continuous curve that gets nearer to or further from its central point as it goes round

name: star
trans: n. 星，恒星；明星；星形物 vt. 用星号标于；由…主演，由…担任主角 vi. 担任主角 adj. 明星的，主角的；星形的 n. (Star)人名；(瑞典)斯塔尔；(德)施塔尔

sentences.english: I lay on my back and looked up at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 我仰卧着看天上的星星。

sentences.english: The sky was filled with stars.
sentences.chinese: 满天繁星。

sentences.english: The stars were shining .
sentences.chinese: 群星闪烁。

sentences.english: The stars were all out (= they were shining ) .
sentences.chinese: 星耀天空。

sentences.english: The stars were twinkling overhead (= shining and quickly changing from bright to faint ) .
sentences.chinese: 头顶上星星闪烁。

detailed_translations.english: a large ball of burning gas in space that can be seen at night as a point of light in the sky

detailed_translations.chinese: 以星状物装饰,变成演员

name: triangle
trans: n. 三角（形）；三角关系；三角形之物；三人一组

sentences.english: Yes, it is like a triangle.
sentences.chinese: 是的，它象一个三角形。

sentences.english: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.english: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles

name: gravy
trans: n. 肉汁；不法利润；轻易得来的钱

sentences.english: Can't you call it gravy?
sentences.chinese: 你不能叫这种东西肉汁吧？

sentences.english: You have spilled gravy on the tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 你把肉汁泼到台布上了。

sentences.english: They will even pour gravy on your sandwiches if you let them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意的话，他们甚至会给你的三明治浇上肉汁。

detailed_translations.english: a sauce made from the juice that comes from meat as it cooks, mixed with flour and water

name: smell
trans: n. 气味，嗅觉；臭味 v. 嗅，闻；有……气味；察觉到；发出……的气味 n. (Smell) （美、俄、英、印、新）史默乐（人名）

sentences.english: I can smell burning.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到烧焦的气味。

sentences.english: Can you smell something?
sentences.chinese: 你闻到什么气味了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to notice or recognize a particular smell
the quality that people and animals recognize by using their nose

name: stuffing
trans: n. 填料，填塞物

sentences.english: sage and onion stuffing
sentences.chinese: 洋苏叶和洋葱填料

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of bread or rice, onion etc that you put inside a chicken, pepper etc before cooking it

name: Thanksgiving
trans: n. 感恩

sentences.chinese: 他说有时候他们也会邀请一些朋友来一起分享感恩节快乐。

sentences.english: I hear about these people every Thanksgiving, then never think about them again for the next 364 days.
sentences.chinese: 我在每个感恩节都听说过这群人，而后在接下来的364天，就再也没有想起过他们。

sentences.english: It compares with "Cyber Monday" in the US - the day after Thanksgiving marketed as a big online shopping day.
sentences.chinese: 它与“网络星期一”在美国，感恩节后的第一天销售作为一个大型网上购物一天。

detailed_translations.english: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc

name: turkey
trans: n. 火鸡；笨蛋；失败之作

sentences.english: roast turkey
sentences.chinese: 烤火鸡

detailed_translations.english: a bird that looks like a large chicken and is often eaten at Christmas and at Thanksgiving

name: yam
trans: n. 山药 甘薯 白薯

sentences.english: And we went into the poisonous giant tubers, like the yam and the taro, which also had to be leeched, ground up and cooked before we could eat them.
sentences.chinese: 我们也寻找到了那些带有毒性的、个头颇大的块茎，像山药、芋头，这些在食用之前得经过榨取、提炼和烹饪。

detailed_translations.english: a tropical climbing plant grown for its root, which is eaten as a vegetable

name: sister
trans: n. 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士 adj. 姐妹般的；同类型的

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

name: teacher
trans: n. 教师；导师 n. (Teacher)人名；(英)蒂彻

sentences.english: a primary school teacher
sentences.chinese: 小学教师

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to teach, especially in a school

name: yourself
trans: pron. 你自己

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

name: snake
trans: n. 蛇；阴险的人 vi. 迂回前进 vt. 拉（木材等）；迂回前进

sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

if a river, road, train, or line snakes somewhere, it moves in long twisting curves

name: corn
trans: n. （美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼 vt. 腌；使成颗粒 n. (Corn)人名；(英、法、瑞典)科恩

sentences.english: fields of corn
sentences.chinese: 一片片麦田

sentences.english: an ear of corn
sentences.chinese: 谷穗

detailed_translations.english: plants such as wheat,  barley  , and  oats  or their seeds

trans: n. 树叶，叶片；花瓣；（纸）页，张；薄金属片；活动桌板，折叠桌板；（窗、门等）扇；空心墙的内面（或外面）（leaf 的复数） v. 离开；让……留下（leave 的第三人称单数）

trans: n. 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃 adj. 春天的 vi. 生长；涌出；跃出；裂开 vt. 使跳起；使爆炸；突然提出；使弹开 n. (Spring)人名；(德)施普林；(英、芬、瑞典)斯普林

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet (= stood up suddenly ) and rushed after her.
sentences.chinese: 他腾地站起身，冲过去追她。

sentences.english: There are several hot springs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这地区有几处温泉。

sentences.english: With a spring, the cat leapt on to the table.
sentences.chinese: 猫一跃跳上桌子。

sentences.english: Let me know when they come.
sentences.chinese: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.english: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候能回家？

detailed_translations.english: to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are

name: storm
trans: n. 暴风雨；大动荡 vi. 起风暴；横冲直撞；狂怒咆哮 vt. 猛攻；怒骂 n. (Storm)人名；(瑞典)斯托姆；(德)施托姆；(英、西、芬)斯托姆

sentences.chinese: 州长发现自己处于一场政治风暴的中心。

sentences.english: An angry crowd stormed the embassy.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的人群突然袭击大使馆。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people suddenly express very strong feelings about something that someone has said or done

name: wind
trans: n. 风；呼吸；气味；卷绕 vt. 缠绕；上发条；使弯曲；吹号角；绕住或缠住某人 vi. 缠绕；上发条；吹响号角 n. (Wind)人名；(英、德、瑞典)温德

sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

name: berries
trans: 浆果类

name: brownie
trans: n. 巧克力蛋糕，核仁巧克力饼；棕仙（传说中夜间帮助做家务的小精灵）

name: candy
trans: n. 糖果，巧克力；冰糖；（糖果包装的）毒品；中看不中用的东西 v. 把……制成蜜饯；用糖煮；使结晶

sentences.english: ...a piece of candy.
sentences.chinese: …一块糖果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化
糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
detailed_translations.english: Candy is sweet foods such as chocolate or toffees

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

name: ice cream
trans: 冰淇淋

sentences.english: I like ice cream and cookies as much as the next guy. But I hate how it makes me feel afterward.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冰淇淋和曲奇，但我又讨厌吃完之后所带给我的感受，疲倦，瞌睡，精力不集中等等。

sentences.english: If you enjoy chocolate ice cream, as I do, when confronted with a tub of it would you also enjoy eating as much of the tub as possible?
sentences.chinese: 如果你像我一样喜欢吃巧克力冰淇淋，那么当你面前放着一桶这样的冰淇淋时，你是否会敞开肚子尽量多吃呢？

sentences.english: On the morning of the stroke, I woke up to a pounding pain behind my left eye. And it was the kind of pain, caustic pain, that you get when you bite into ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 那 天早上，我从睡梦中醒来，发现自己的左脑疼痛不止，那种痛楚跟你咬冰淇淋的那种腐蚀性的感觉一样，它抓住我，然后又放开，然后再次抓住，再次放开。

name: nut
trans: n. 螺母，螺帽；坚果；难对付的人，难解的问题 vi. 采坚果 n. (Nut)人名；(阿拉伯)努特；(柬)努

sentences.english: Use a wrench to loosen the nut.
sentences.chinese: 用活动扳手将螺帽拧松。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of metal with a hole through the middle which is screwed onto a bolt to fasten things together

trans: adj. 有趣的，好笑的，滑稽的；（口）稀奇的，古怪的，奇异的；有病的，不舒服的；狡猾的，欺骗（性）的，可疑的，不光明 n. 滑稽人物；笑话，有趣的故事；滑稽连环漫画栏；（英）（比赛用）单人双桨小艇

sentences.english: the funniest man in Britain
sentences.chinese: 英国最滑稽的男人

sentences.english: If this is your idea of a joke, I don’t find it at all funny .
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得这是个玩笑，那我认为它一点也不好笑。

sentences.english: Luckily, when I explained the situation, he saw the funny side (= recognized that it was partly funny ) .
sentences.chinese: 好在我把情况解释了以后，他看到了好笑的一面。

sentences.english: His laughter stopped her mid-sentence. ‘ What’s so funny? ’ she demanded.
sentences.chinese: 他的笑声打断了她的话。“有什么好笑的？”她厉声问道。

sentences.english: What’s that funny smell?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么怪味？

detailed_translations.english: making you laugh

name: old
trans: adj. 陈旧的，古老的；年老的 n. 古时 n. (Old)人名；(英)奥尔德

sentences.english: an old man
sentences.chinese: 一位老人

sentences.english: How old are you?
sentences.chinese: 你多大年纪？

sentences.english: Are you older than Sally?
sentences.chinese: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.english: You’re old enough to get your own breakfast now.
sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

sentences.english: I’m not coming skating. I’m too old for that now.
sentences.chinese: 我不去玩溜冰，我现在太老玩不动了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is old has lived for a very long time

name: wet
trans: adj. [气象][物] 潮湿的；有雨的 n. 雨天；湿气 vt. 弄湿 vi. 变湿 n. (Wet)人名；(英、纳米、南非)韦特

sentences.english: I’ve washed your shirt but it’s still wet.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的衬衫洗过了，不过现在还是湿的。

sentences.english: wet grass
sentences.chinese: 湿草地

sentences.english: The man in the boat was wet through (= completely wet ).
sentences.chinese: 船上的那人浑身湿透。

detailed_translations.english: covered in or full of water or another liquid
the rain
to make something wet

name: dry
trans: adj. 干的；口渴的；枯燥无味的；禁酒的 vt. 把…弄干 vi. 变干 n. 干涸 n. (Dry)人名；(法)德里

sentences.english: I need to change into some dry clothes .
sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.english: Make sure that the surface is clean and dry before you start to paint.
sentences.chinese: 油漆之前一定先要确保表面清洁干燥。

sentences.english: You should store disks in a cool, dry place.
sentences.chinese: 你应该把磁盘存放在阴凉干燥的地方。

sentences.english: The path is dry as a bone (= very dry ) .
sentences.chinese: 这条小道很干燥。

detailed_translations.english: without water or liquid inside or on the surface

name: feel
trans: vt. 感觉；认为；触摸；试探 vi. 觉得；摸索 n. 感觉；触摸

sentences.english: I am feeling very depressed.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Suddenly I felt a sharp pain in my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我突然感到肩部一阵剧痛。

sentences.english: I felt as if all my strength had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得好象自己的力气已经全没了。

sentences.english: I felt like I was being kicked in the teeth every day.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉我好像每天都在经受挫折。

detailed_translations.english: If you feel a particular emotion or physical sensation, you experience it

name: rough
trans: adj. 粗糙的；粗略的；粗野的；艰苦的；未经加工的 vt. 使粗糙；粗暴对待；草拟 n. 艰苦；高低不平的地面；未经加工的材料；粗糙的部分 vi. 举止粗野 adv. 粗糙地；粗略地；粗暴地 n. (Rough)人名；(英)拉夫

sentences.english: Her hands were rough from hard work.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手因为干重活而变得很粗糙。

sentences.english: the rough terrain at the base of the mountains
sentences.chinese: 山脚下崎岖不平的地形

sentences.english: We were bumping over the rough ground.

sentences.english: They live near London.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在伦敦附近。

sentences.english: I’m sure they live somewhere near here.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他们就住在这附近。

sentences.english: They moved house to be nearer the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们把家搬到离学校近一些。

sentences.english: She told the children not to go near the canal.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉孩子们不要走近运河。

sentences.english: I’m warning you - don’t come any nearer!
sentences.chinese: 我警告你别再靠近！

sentences.english: We heard voices as we drew near the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们走近村子时听见了说话声。

detailed_translations.english: only a short distance from a person or thing
only a short distance away from someone or something

name: beach
trans: n. 海滩；湖滨 vt. 将…拖上岸 vi. 搁浅；定居 n. (Beach)人名；(英)比奇

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

name: museum
trans: n. 博物馆

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a building where important  cultural, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

name: playground
trans: n. 运动场，操场；游乐场

sentences.english: children shouting and running in the playground
sentences.chinese: 在操场上叫嚷奔跑的孩子们

detailed_translations.english: an area for children to play, especially at a school or in a park, that often has special equipment for climbing on, riding on etc

name: woods
trans: n. （林）树林，森林；木头 v. 供以木材；用树木覆盖（wood 的第三人称单数） n. (Woods) （美、加、英）伍兹（人名）

name: has
trans: v. 有，吃，得到，从事，允许，雇用，享有（have的第三人称单数）；（亲属关系中）接受；拿；买到

sentences.english: Air not only occupies space but it also has weight.
sentences.chinese: 空气不仅占据空间，而且它还具有重量。

sentences.english: Her copy of 《Evangeline》 has many helpful notes at the back.
sentences.chinese: 她那本《伊万杰琳》后面有许多有用的注解。

sentences.english: I believe she has some influence with the headmaster -- she might persuade him.
sentences.chinese: 我相信她的话在校长面前有一些分量，她有可能说服他。

name: have
trans: vt. 有；让；拿；从事；允许 aux. 已经 n. (Have)人名；(芬)哈韦；(德)哈弗

sentences.english: Our guests have arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我们的客人到了。

sentences.english: Has anyone phoned?
sentences.chinese: 有人打过电话来吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been spending too much money.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经花掉太多钱了。

sentences.english: I hadn’t seen him for 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 我已经15年没见他了。

sentences.english: ‘I hope you’ve read the instructions.’ ‘Yes, of course I have.’
sentences.chinese: “我希望你已经看过使用说明了。”“当然看过了。”

sentences.english: You haven’t done much, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你没做多少，是吗？

sentences.english: They used to have a Mercedes Benz.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾经拥有一辆奔驰汽车。

sentences.english: She sat down and had another drink.
sentences.chinese: 她坐下来又喝了一杯。

detailed_translations.chinese: （与过去分词连用构成完成时）
detailed_translations.english: used with past participles to form perfect tenses
used to say that someone owns something or that it is available for them to use

name: he
trans: pron. 他；（泛指的）人；上帝 n. 男性，男子；雄性动物 n. (He) （中、美、丹）赫（人名）

sentences.english: ‘Where’s Paul?’ ‘He’s gone to the cinema.’
sentences.chinese: “保罗在哪儿？”“他去看电影了。”

sentences.english: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.chinese: 是他先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: I
trans: n. 英语字母i；虚数；罗马数字1；美国州际公路；碘元素

sentences.english: I moved to this city six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前我搬到了这个城市。

sentences.english: I’m not late again, am I?
sentences.chinese: 我没有又迟到吧？

sentences.english: My husband and I enjoy going to the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫喜欢去剧院看戏。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

name: she
trans: pron. 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等） n. 女人；雌性动物 n. (She)人名；(中)佘(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: they
trans: pron. 他们；它们；她们

sentences.english: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.english: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.chinese: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.english: They all want to come to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们都想来参加婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

name: we
trans: pron. 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人 n. (We)人名；(缅)韦

sentences.english: ‘Did you go into the supermarket?’ ‘No, we didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你们进超级市场了吗？”“我们没有进去。”

sentences.english: Shall we stop for a coffee?
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来喝杯咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: So we all travelled down to Brighton together.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们一起都去了布赖顿。

sentences.english: We declare our support for a government of national unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们宣布支持一个全国统一的政府。

sentences.english: We Italians are proud of our history.
sentences.chinese: 我们意大利人为自己的历史感到自豪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人
detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

name: who
trans: pron. 谁；什么人

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

name: you
trans: pron. 你；你们 n. (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

name: brush
trans: n. 刷子；画笔；毛笔；争吵；冲突；灌木丛地带；矮树丛；狐狸尾巴 vt. 刷；画； vi. 刷；擦过；掠过；（经过时）轻触

sentences.english: a scrubbing brush
sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for cleaning, painting, making your hair tidy etc, made with a lot of hairs,  bristle s  , or thin pieces of plastic, fastened to a handle

name: computer
trans: n. 计算机；电脑；电子计算机

sentences.english: a huge global computer network
sentences.chinese: 巨大的全球计算机网络

sentences.english: the latest computer software
sentences.chinese: 最新的计算机软件

detailed_translations.english: an electronic machine that stores information and uses programs to help you find, organize, or change the information

name: finger
trans: n. 手指；指针，指状物 vt. 伸出；用手指拨弄 vi. 用指触摸；拨弄 n. (Finger)人名；(英、德、捷)芬格；(俄)芬格尔

sentences.english: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
sentences.chinese: 那女人手指上戴着戒指，因此我猜想她已经结婚了。

sentences.english: We ate with our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手抓着吃。

detailed_translations.english: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb

name: marker
trans: n. （表示方位的）标记；（性质或状况的）标志；记号笔；阅卷人；紧逼防守的队员；参照标准；标志基因；本票，借据；记分员 n. (Marker) （美）马克（人名）

sentences.english: He buried the bodies in a single grave with a wooden cross as a marker.
sentences.chinese: 他把尸体都埋在一个坟墓里，用一个木十字架作为标记。

detailed_translations.chinese: 记分员；书签；标识物；作记号的人
detailed_translations.english: something which shows that a quality or feature exists or is present

name: pen
trans: n. 钢笔；作家；围栏 vt. 写；关入栏中 n. (Pen)人名；(法)庞；(俄、塞、英、意)佩恩；(柬)宾

sentences.english: a ballpoint pen
sentences.chinese: 圆珠笔

sentences.english: a felt-tip pen
sentences.chinese: 毡头笔

sentences.english: a pen and ink drawing
sentences.chinese: 钢笔画

detailed_translations.english: an instrument for writing or drawing with ink

name: stick
trans: vt. 刺，戳；伸出；粘贴 vi. 坚持；伸出；粘住 n. 棍；手杖；呆头呆脑的人 n. (Stick) (芬) 斯蒂克 (人名)

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

name: bend
trans: v. 使弯曲，折弯；使屈服；拐弯，转弯；倾斜，偏向；（四肢等）弯曲；歪曲，篡改；使致力，专心于；系，缚（缆绳） n. 转弯，弯道；弯曲；绑结；（潜水员的）减压病 (the bends)；（纹章上）对角条纹 n. (Bend) （美、丹、德）本德（人名）

sentences.english: Lee bent and kissed her.
sentences.chinese: 李俯下身来亲她。

sentences.english: She bent her head.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头。

sentences.english: Bend your knees, but keep your back straight.
sentences.chinese: 膝盖弯曲，背部保持挺直。

detailed_translations.english: to move part of your body so that it is not straight or so that you are not upright
to become curved and no longer flat or straight
a curved part of something, especially a road or river

name: dance
trans: n. 舞蹈；舞会；舞曲 vi. 跳舞；跳跃；飘扬 vt. 跳舞；使跳跃 adj. 舞蹈的；用于跳舞的 n. (Dance)人名；(英)丹斯；(法)当斯

sentences.english: Come on, let’s dance.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，我们跳舞吧。

sentences.english: The words danced before her tired eyes.
sentences.chinese: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

sentences.english: The waltz is an easy dance to learn.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹这种舞很容易学。

detailed_translations.english: to move your body to the sound and rhythm of music
a special set of movements performed to a particular type of music

name: leap
trans: v. 跳，跳跃；急速移动，猛冲；突然做（某事）；剧增，猛涨；（车辆）突然移动 n. 飞跃；跳跃，跳高；骤变；剧增；（用于地名）跃过或起跳处 n. (Leap)（美、法、英）莱亚（人名）

sentences.english: She leapt over the fence.
sentences.chinese: 她跳过篱笆。

sentences.english: He threw a stick into the river and the dog went after it in a flying leap.
sentences.chinese: 他把一根枝条扔到河里，那条狗一个飞跃就追了过去。

detailed_translations.english: to jump high into the air or to jump in order to land in a different place
a big jump

name: prance
trans: v. 昂首阔步；（马）后足立地腾跃 n. 昂首阔步；（马）后足立地腾跃 n. (Prance) （美、英、加、澳）普兰斯（人名）

detailed_translations.english: to walk or dance with high steps or large movements, especially in a confident way

name: skip
trans: vi. 跳跃；跳绳；遗漏；跳读 vt. 跳过；遗漏 n. 跳跃；跳读 n. (Skip)人名；(英)斯基普

sentences.english: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one subject to another in no fixed order
a skipping movement

name: step
trans: n. 步，脚步；步骤；步伐；梯级 vi. 踏，踩；走 vt. 走，迈步

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

name: this
trans: pron. 这，这个；这样；今，本；……的这个；有个 adj. 这，这个（离说话人较近的） adv. 这样地，这么 n. (This) （法、美、印、巴）蒂斯（人名）

sentences.english: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.chinese: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.english: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands
